Bamsoet Vs Airlangga, Next Ketum Golkar Dinilai Tergantung Titah Jokowi
05 Nov 2019, 08:56 by Gibran Maulana Ibrahim
Jakarta - Bambang Soesatyo (Bamsoet) didorong lagi oleh loyalisnya untuk maju ke gelanggang Munas Golkar bertarung melawan Airlangga Hartarto memperebutkan posisi ketua umum. Perebutan kursi ketua umum partai berlambang beringin ini dinilai bisa ditentukan oleh Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi).
Hal itu disampaikan pengamat politik Hendri Satrio. Hendri awalnya berbicara soal isu deal-deal politik antara Bamsoet dan Airlangga terkait Munas Golkar dan kursi Ketua MPR.
"Sulit memang memastikan komitmen atau kesepakatan antara Airlangga dan Bamsoet tentang persaingan Ketum Golkar. Kendati beredar kabar bahwa Bamsoet urung maju ke kompetisi perebutan kursi Ketum Golkar karena ada kesepakatan dengan Airlangga perihal kursi Ketua MPR tapi dorongan pemegang suara yang mendukung Bamsoet sulit dihentikan," kata Hendri Satrio dalam keterangannya, Selasa (5/11/2019).
Hendri menyebut Bamsoet bakal percaya diri jika mendapat dukungan dari para pemilik suara. Sementara itu, dia yakin Airlangga juga tengah mempersiapkan diri.
"Bamsoet pasti semringah dan percaya diri bila mendapat banyak dukungan dari pemegang suara. Oleh karena itu Airlangga pun harus melakukan konsolidasi di internal Partai Golkar," imbuh dia.
Lalu, apa kaitan perebutan kursi Ketum Golkar dengan Jokowi? Hendri Satrio punya analisisnya.
"Pun, kalau keduanya jadi maju, pasti seru, tapi mesti diingat jalur politik Golkar adalah jalur kekuasaan, maka 'titah' Jokowi juga akan menentukan siapa Ketum Golkar selanjutnya," ucap Hendri Satrio.

text:
Bamsoet Vs Airlangga, Next Ketum Golkar Judged Depends on the Decree of Jokowi
05 Nov 2019, 08:56 by Gibran Maulana Ibrahim
Jakarta - Bambang Soesatyo (Bamsoet) was pushed again by his loyalists to advance to the Golkar National Conference arena to fight against Airlangga Hartarto for the position of chairman. The struggle for the chair of the party chairman bearing the banyan symbol is judged to be determined by President Joko Widodo (Jokowi).
This was conveyed by political observer Hendri Satrio. Hendri initially spoke about the issue of political deals between Bamsoet and Airlangga regarding the Golkar National Conference and the chair of the MPR Chair.
"It is difficult indeed to ensure a commitment or agreement between Airlangga and Bamsoet regarding the Golkar Ketum competition. Although it is rumored that Bamsoet has failed to advance to the competition for the Golkar Ketum chair because there is an agreement with Airlangga regarding the chair of the MPR Chair, but the encouragement of the vote holders supporting Bamsoet is difficult to stop," said Hendri Satrio in his statement on Tuesday (11/05/2019).
Hendri said Bamsoet would be confident if it had the support of the voters. Meanwhile, he was sure that Airlangga was also preparing.
"Bamsoet will definitely be happy and confident if he gets a lot of support from the voters. Therefore Airlangga must also consolidate internally within the Golkar Party," he added.
Then, what is the connection between the struggle for the Golkar Ketum chair and Jokowi? Hendri Satrio has his analysis.
"Even if both of them go forward, it must be exciting, but it must be remembered that the political path of Golkar is the path of power, then Jokowi's 'decree' will also determine who the next Golkar Chairperson is," said Hendri Satrio.
